p: Based on the 2003 SARS-CoV epidemic, the Chinese government carried out many effective measures, including limited access to public transportation, reducing migration flow and promoting personal protection providing masks to the inhabitants of Wuhan and other provinces. However, there are already reported cases of infected hospital personnel. Therefore, healthcare staff should be informed about and compelled to comply with any protective measures necessary, such as the use of gloves, eye masks and N95 masks when examining patients who could have been in contact with infected patients or have traveled to or been close to areas reporting cases of infection (China) (Phan 2020; Li et al. 2020a; Jin et al. 2020).
